metadata.title: Lesco 101186 High Wheel Walk-Behind Fertilizer Spreader with 092463 Agitator Repair Kit (Bundle, 2 Items)
features: Bundle includes 2 Items: (1) Lesco 101186 High Wheel Walk-Behind Spreader with (1) 092463 Agitator Repair Kit
Frame: Stainless Steel ; With built-in deflector
Tire Size: 13 x 5.00-6 ; Dimensions: 48" x 25" x 35" ; Weighs 42 lbs. (empty)
092463 Agitator Repair Kit includes 1 x Agitator (# 092126), 1 x Plastic Washer (# 005530), 1 x Plastic Bushing (# 060027), 1 x Actuator (# 092125), 1 x E-Clip (# 092127)
description: Bundle includes 2 Items: (1) Lesco 101186 High Wheel Walk-Behind Spreader with (1) 092463 Agitator Repair Kit. The Lesco 101186 High Wheel Walk-Behind Fertilizer Spreader is considered by professional landscapers in the lawn care industry as the premier choice and industry standard spreader. With its all stainless steel frame and 80 lb. hopper capacity, the Lesco 101186 Walk-Behind Spreader can handle the toughest lawn spreading tasks. The hopper can be filled with granular fertilizers and grass seed to feed lawns in the spring and summer. In winter, you can spread ice melt or dry free-flowing salt on walkways, pathways, driveways, etc. to prevent slipping accidents. The handles are adjustable to three different positions to accommodate to users of all sizes. The 13 x 5.00-6 oversized tires, which have no rust rims, increase stability and provide excellent traction on taller, thicker, and rougher lawns. The unique cam-operated oscillating agitator improves product flow and sweeps beyond the hole openings in both directions, helping eliminate product bridging and product damage. The 5:1 gear ratio and enclosed gearbox provide even product distribution, while protecting the gears from dust and debris. A manual deflector comes standard to prevent materials from dispersing on the right side of the spreader. The Lesco 092463 Agitator Repair Kit includes the parts you need to replace or repair the existing agitator found on the Lesco 101186 / 091186 Spreaders.
